description:
A fast DWG/DXF viewer and measurement tool

CAD Reader is a fast and easy-to-use DXF & DWG drawing viewer, which can open, view, mark, measure, and share your AutoCAD files easily.
New Updates
1. Added the Convert Layout to Model feature.
2. Optimized comment deletion with marquee selection.
3. Enhanced the PDF export function with added support for layers.
